title: godoc: example selector on the front page doesn't switch between examples
body:
Seems that due to the recent improvements to godoc the select box where you can choose
between different examples on the front page now does nothing, the contents are always
stuck at the "Hello, World!" example. I had a brief look at the code in
playground.js and it seems the part that set up "toysEl" was completely
removed.

This affects the front page of the golang.org website
